name: Can I Sleep
description:
Description

You play as a little mind creature who resides inside of a kid who is having trouble sleeping. Due to the lack of sleep she has been seeing things at night. It's your job to get rid of the hallucinations and fix any cracks that appear in her brain. To help the kid you can destroy hallucinations by using the control panels in the brain.

Controls

W : Move forward

S: Move backwards

A: Turn Left 

D: Turn right

Right arrow: Turn eyes right

Left arrow : Turn eyes left

E: Interact

Credits Developers

Ronan Boyd - Programmer/3d modeler /Animator

Jelena Babich - Artist / Programmer
